pr_title: Restore active scanning everything in scope

timeline.message:
Restore active scanning everything in scope

Do not create a `Target` with invalid start node (i.e. null node), just
ignore it (has no special meaning).
Prevent constructing a `StructuralSiteNode` with a null node, to fail
early as possible.

Fix #6102.

Signed-off-by: thc202 <thc202@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: These two test methods confuse me. They're named as if null shouldn't be accepted but then assert a null result.

replies.bodyText: That's because they are expected to still be null, before the changes the (wrapped) site node would be added to the list of the start nodes which would make it non-null. The assert for the start node getter is just for exercising it, i.e. still works properly in this specific case.
